channel.title: Posts on 邹子妍
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on 邹子妍

item.title: My name
item.description: How to pronouce my name? The IPA version of my name in Mandarin has been shown below: 邹 /tsoʊ55/ # the traditional character of my surname is “鄒” 子 /tsɿ21/ # it contains a Mandarin half Tone3 sandhi 妍 /jɛn35/ # it means beauty which comes from my father’s 3-day efforts on looking up the dictionary after my birth I am not rejecting beauty entering my life or even becoming the title of my life.
